title: (x) Formula 1 Font - probably custom, similar to (slanted) Futura {Jonathan G, Florian}
author: iRev - Matt

comments.content: I think that the number 1 in the negative space of the F, and vice versa, as well as the extreme slant and the overall imbalance of the letter forms would suggest it's a custom logotype.
I agree. If youâ€™re looking for something similar, you could start by slanting [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110101849/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/futura/alternate_cuts.html).
